---
category: news
title: "CJ frames Artificial Intelligence Committee"
excerpt: "Chief Justice of J&K High Court Justice Gita Mittal has constituted Artificial Intelligence Committee. The committee is comprised of Justice Rajesh Bindal (Chairperson) and Justice Puneet Gupta (Member) and it will look into the aspects of use of Artificial Intelligence language technology in translation of judicial documents."
